feed.title: Track Awesome Devenv Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome tools, resources and workflow tips making an awesome development environment.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Sep 20, 2022
entry.content:
Terminal / Extensions

  • freshenv (⭐172) - Provision, share, manage local and cloud developer environments.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Mar 26, 2021
entry.content:
Workflow / Extensions

  • just - A task runner for conveniently saving and running project-specific commands. Similar to make, but much nicer

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Dec 11, 2020
entry.content:
Documentation

  • Log4brains (⭐1.3k) - Docs-as-code knowledge base to manage Architecture Decision Records (ADR) for your project and publish them automatically as a static website.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 26, 2020
entry.content:
Terminal / Extensions

  • zoxide (⭐28k) - A better way to navigate your filesystem. Written in Rust, cross-shell, and much faster than other autojumpers.

Workflow / Extensions

  • Gebug (⭐632) - A tool that makes debugging of Dockerized Go applications super easy by enabling Debugger and Hot-Reload features, seamlessly.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jan 16, 2020
entry.content:
Misc / Extensions

  • HTTP Toolkit - an HTTP inspection & debugging desktop application

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Oct 18, 2019
entry.content:
Terminal / Extensions

  • hss (⭐363) - Never type the annoying ssh commands again.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Sep 05, 2019
entry.content:
Misc / Extensions

  • ML Workspace - All-in-one web-based development environment for machine learning and data science.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 23, 2019
entry.content:
Visual Studio Code

  • Dev Git Repo (⭐174k) - Github code repository for VS Code
  • Monaco Editor Git Repo (⭐43k) - Github code repository for underlying browser-based editor

Visual Studio Code / Extensions

  • VS Code Extension Marketplace - Official website for extensions
  • Python extension - Official Python extension
  • Sync settings - Excellent extension for settings and extension sync of your VS code setup

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 16, 2019
entry.content:
Workflow / Extensions

  • Prodmodel (⭐58) - Build tool for data science pipelines.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Feb 25, 2019
entry.content:
Workflow / Extensions

  • LiveReload - FS watch and preprocessor as a desktop app for /OSX/ and /WIN/ with complementary browser extensions
    • guard-livereload (⭐2.1k) - Guard plugin compatible with LiveReload's browser extensions
    • simplehttp (⭐67) Fastest and simplest way to start serving a local directory over http.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jan 27, 2019
entry.content:
Misc / Extensions

  • Fenix Web Server - A multi-host local static web server with push-button sharing (desktop app).

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Apr 28, 2018
entry.content:
Text / Extensions

  • ripgrep (⭐54k) - Faster than grep, written in Rust

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jan 23, 2018
entry.content:
Presentation / Extensions

  • mithril-slides (⭐25) - A Keynote-inspired presentation app written with Mithril

  • Mockoon - an API / HTTP REST mocking desktop application

Diagnostics

  • gtop (⭐9.8k)

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Oct 18, 2017
entry.content:
Vim

  • Completor (⭐1.3k) - async autocomplete with support for omni and semantic completion.

Workflow / Extensions

  • ergo (⭐636) - The management of multiple local services running over different ports made easy.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 26, 2017
entry.content:
Git / Extensions

  • git-secret (⭐3.9k) - A bash-tool to store your private data inside a git repository.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on May 13, 2017
entry.content:
Presentation / Extensions

  • hacker-slides (⭐344) - Reveal.js based presentation tool

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Mar 16, 2017
entry.content:
Orchestration / Extensions

  • Nanobox (⭐1.6k) - A micro-PaaS (μPaaS) for creating consistent, isolated, development environments deployable anywhere https://nanobox.io.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Mar 15, 2017
entry.content:
Terminal / Extensions

  • tmux the awesome terminal multiplexer.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Feb 18, 2017
entry.content:
Notifications / Extensions

  • CatLight - status notifier for developers. Checks the status of continuous delivery builds and shows desktop notifications.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jan 19, 2017
entry.content:
Presentation / Extensions

  • WebSlides (⭐6.3k) - Making HTML presentations easy

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Aug 15, 2016
entry.content:
Workflow / Extensions

  • Zappr (⭐541) - GitHub integration built to enhance your project workflow via enable/disable pull request approval checks.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on May 20, 2016
entry.content:
Atom

  • atom-beautify (⭐1.5k) - Beautify HTML (including Handlebars), CSS (including Sass and Less), JavaScript, and much more in Atom.
  • file-icons (⭐1.3k) - Adds file specific icons to atom for improved visual grepping.
  • highlight-selected (⭐247) - Double click on a word to highlight it throughout the open file.
  • minimap (⭐645) - A graphical map (preview) of the full source code.
  • minimap-git-diff (⭐21) - A minimap binding for the Atom git-diff package.
  • minimap-highlight-selected (⭐41) - A minimap binding for the highlight-selected package.
  • atom-project-manager (⭐511) - Get easy access to all your projects and manage them with project specific settings and options.
  • atom-tree-view-git-status (⭐24) - Show the Git repository status in the Atom tree-view.
  • atom-pigments (⭐521) - An Atom package to display colors in project and files.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Apr 19, 2016
entry.content:
Orchestration / Extensions

  • azk (⭐896) - a lightweight open source engine to orchestrate development environments

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Dec 02, 2015
entry.content:
Git / Extensions

  • tig - an ncurses-based text-mode interface for git

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Oct 13, 2015
entry.content:
Shell / Extensions

  • oh-my-fish (⭐11k) - Framework for managing your fish shell configuration inspired by oh-my-zsh.

Terminal / Extensions

  • Pipe Viewer - a tool for monitoring the progress of data through a pipeline

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Sep 09, 2015
entry.content:
Terminal / Extensions

  • jq - a lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 13, 2015
entry.content:
Git / Extensions

  • git-semver (⭐388) - A git plugin to make Semantic Versioning 2.0.0 and Change Log management easier.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 02, 2015
entry.content:
Dotfiles

  • Paul Miller's (⭐1.2k) - Colourful & robust OS X configuration files and utilities

Git / Extensions

  • awesome-github (⭐529) - Faraz Fallahi maintains a curated list of GitHub & Git resources.

Presentation / Extensions

  • bespoke.js (⭐4.8k) - DIY Presentation Micro-Framework
  • impress.js (⭐38k) - presentation framework based on the power of CSS3 transforms and transitions

Shell / Extensions

  • fish-shell (⭐30k) - The user-friendly command line shell
  • oh-my-zsh (⭐180k) - A community driven framework for managing zsh configuration.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 30, 2015
entry.content:
Shell / Extensions

  • zsh quickstart kit (⭐841) - Quick intro for getting set up with zsh and zgen

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 28, 2015
entry.content:
Dotfiles

  • dotfiles.github.io - Collected dotfile resources. Has sections with dotfile bootstraps and lists of frameworks for various shells and editors.

Shell / Extensions

  • shellcheck (⭐38k) - Lint for shell. Will find deprecated and/or dangerous usage in shell scripts

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 23, 2015
entry.content:
Shell / Extensions

  • awesome-zsh-plugins (⭐17k) - List of zsh plugins usable with zgen (⭐1.5k) and other oh-my-zsh (⭐180k) compatible zsh frameworks
  • zgen (⭐1.5k) - Faster framework for managing your zsh configuration, backward compatible with oh-my-zsh plugins

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 21, 2015
entry.content:
Shell / Extensions

  • zsh - A shell designed for interactive use, although it is also a powerful scripting language.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 03, 2015
entry.content:
Git / Extensions

  • gh (⭐718) - Fast GitHub command line client (hub port to Go)
  • git-extra-commands (⭐1.1k) - collected git helper scripts
  • git-extras (⭐18k) - GIT utilities -- repo summary, repl, changelog population, author commit percentages and more
  • git-it-on (⭐113) - ZSH plugin, adds a gitit command that opens the current directory on github in your current branch
  • git-up (⭐2.6k) - a better 'git pull'

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 02, 2015
entry.content:
Terminal / Extensions

  • homebrew - Makes it easy to install open source packages on an OS X system with a single command.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 01, 2015
entry.content:
Diagnostics

  • nmon

Vim

  • The Ultimate Vim Distribution - spf13-vim is a distribution of vim plugins and resources for Vim, GVim and MacVim.

Sublime Text 3

  • Git Gutter (⭐3.9k) - display changed/added lines in the margin of the editor window.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Apr 30, 2015
entry.content:
Sublime Text 3

  • Emmet (⭐5.2k)

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 24, 2014
entry.content:
Admins

  • MongoHub (⭐2.4k) - Native OSx client for mongo

Benchmarking

  • redis-faina (⭐1.8k) Instagram's Redis counter/timing stats based on the MONITOR command

Intellij

  • keymap (⭐10) - a hybrid Vim/ReSharper/Intellij keymap

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 16, 2014
entry.content:
Presentation / Extensions

  • reveal.js (⭐69k) - markdown based presentation on your browser
  • deck.js (⭐5.4k) - markdown based presentation on your browser

Terminal / Extensions

  • fasd (⭐5.9k) Command-line productivity booster, offers quick access to files and directories.

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 15, 2014
entry.content:
Dotfiles

  • Zach Holman's (⭐7.5k) - oh-my-zsh, osx, Zsh, vi, Ruby, Git, and more
  • Mathias Bynens's (⭐31k) - .files, including ~/.osx — sensible hacker defaults for OS X
  • Thoughtbot's (⭐8.1k) - A set of vim, zsh, git, and tmux configuration files

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 11, 2014
entry.content:
Benchmarking

  • boom (⭐4.7k)

Git / Extensions

  • scm_breeze (⭐0) Streamline your git workflow

Workflow / Extensions

  • guard (⭐6.4k) - FS watch tool with a huge ecosystem of plugins

entry.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 10, 2014
entry.content:
Admins

  • Robomongo - a cross platform Admin for MongoDB

Benchmarking

  • apachebench (ab)
  • httperf
  • phantomas (⭐2.3k) - website perf evaluation tool
  • siege
  • Vegeta (⭐24k)
  • wrk (⭐39k)

Data

  • s3cmd (⭐4.7k) - the S3 CLI tool for Amazon

Diagnostics

  • glances (⭐29k)

Desktop

  • Alfred - OSX productivity app /OSX/
  • hydra (⭐5.2k) - script your desktop /OSX/
  • Keycastr (⭐475) - show your keys while presenting/casting /OSX/

Vim

  • Powerline (⭐15k) - improved status bar for your buffers.
  • snipmate (⭐2k) - textual snippets compatiable with Textmate snippets.

Sublime Text 3

  • AdvancedNewFile (⭐831) - File creation plugin.
  • jsFormat (⭐1.4k) - Javascript formatting.
  • LiveReload - LiveReload plugin.
  • MarkdownEditing (⭐3.2k) - Markdown syntax understanding and good color schemes.
  • Package Control - The Sublime Text package manager.
  • RubyTest (⭐720) - Plugin for running Ruby tests.
  • Side Bar Enhancments (⭐2.2k) - Enhancements to Sublime Text sidebar. Files and folders.
  • Sublime Git (⭐2.8k) - Git Integration for Sublime.
  • Sublime Linter (⭐2k) - Interactive code linting.
  • TrailingSpaces (⭐896) - Highlight trailing spaces and delete them in a flash.

Git / Extensions

  • git-sweep (⭐2.6k) - safely removes branches that have been merged into the master
  • hub - git CLI wrapper which makes working with GitHub easier

Presentation / Extensions

  • remark (⭐13k) - markdown based presentation on your browser
  • vimdeck (⭐1.4k) - present inside your Vim

Text / Extensions

  • ack (⭐1.5k) - the Perl based better-than-grep tool.
  • ag (⭐27k) - A C based code-searching tool similar to ack, but faster
  • peco (⭐7.8k) - interactive filtering, like interactive Grep

Terminal / Extensions

  • autojump (⭐17k) - remembers your folders and jump to them based on partial recall (e.g. j proj will jump to /home/Users/yourself/projects.
  • httpie A command line HTTP client, a user-friendly cURL replacement.
  • iTerm2 - a great terminal replacement /OSX/
  • oh-my-zsh (⭐180k) - the incredible ZSH addon.

Workflow / Extensions

  • fswatch (⭐5.3k) - a watch tool which will emit FS events and you can run commands on demand with. Note - fswatch-run too.
  • watchman (⭐13k) - Facebook's better watch - note it works as a service.
